Title: Establishes local labor requirements as part of the approval to receive a real property tax business investment exemption
Summary: Establishes local labor requirements as part of the approval to receive a real property tax business investment exception; requires eighty-five percent of workers hired by a contractor or developer for a project to be from the same county or an adjoining county or, in certain circumstances, the state of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing local labor requirements as part of the approval to receive a real property tax business investment exemption
